Text:
Great torrent, great game, thanks! 

Very cartoon-esque comic book style gaming, and despite the slightly poor quality of the in-game artwork (you'd expect better from Marvel artists!!!) its a great game that fits in nicely with the Marvel world
Working perfectly with USB Loader GX. I didn't like the game so much though. Anyway, thank you very much for the upload! Quality release from HobbitGamez as usual.
